levels.description: Blocks the <@ba.vup>Sandstorm</>. When fortified, immediately recovers all HP, DEF <@ba.vup>+{def}</> and no longer receives damage from the <@ba.vup>Sandstorm</>, but can still be instantly destroyed by <High-Energy Originium Bomb>.
Fortified state: Blocks the <@ba.vup>Sandstorm</>, no longer receives damage from the <@ba.vup>Sandstorm</>, but can still be instantly destroyed by <High-Energy Originium Bomb>.
